infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show your position on the map and report civic issues near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to show your position on the map and report civic issues near you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of civic issues.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images of civic issues.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Civic AI to use your location to show your position on the map and report issues near you.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Civic AI to access your camera to take photos of civic issues.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Civic AI to access your photo library to select images of civic issues.
